about_the_game:
Toy Hunt is a player co-op mascot horror game with a prop-hunting twist. Play as prototype toys hiding from mascot seekers, or become a seeker youself. Explore the eerie Playplex facility across diverse maps with regular updates bringing new features to keep the experience fresh and chilling.

Hunt or Be Hunted

Play as one of four unique mascots—Donkey Dan, Doodle Duck, Jeremy the Giraffe, or Shutter Sam—tasked with tracking down experimental prototype toys capable of shapeshifting into the environment's props.

Explore the Playplex

Discover four meticulously designed maps, each with its own distinct theme:

  • Playcade: An arcade filled with fantasy and fun.

  • Party Room: A whimsical birthday area brimming with balloons and surprises.

  • Play Park: A giant indoor playground with towering slides and hidden tunnels.

  • Showtime Theater: An old-style cinema where shadows and props blend into one.

Proximity Voice Chat

Communication is key, but be careful what you say—and who hears it. Using proximity voice chat, players can strategize and share clues while staying close to their teammates. However, mascot seekers can hear you too. Loud conversations or panicked screams may give away your location, making teamwork a risky yet essential part of survival.

More to Come

With regular updates planned, expect new maps, mascots, and features to keep the Playplex growing.

Immersive Gameplay

Dive into intense multiplayer matches where you can choose to hide, or hunt. Use each mascot’s unique abilities to track down toys before time runs out. Toys must master stealth and strategy to survive the relentless pursuit.

Whether you’re hiding as a toy or hunting as a mascot, Toy Hunt delivers the perfect mix of frantic fun and spine-tingling suspense. Are you ready to join the hunt?

name: Toy Hunt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 Super / Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Explore the eerie Playplex facility across diverse maps with regular updates bringing new features to keep the experience fresh and chilling.
